Html: Is there any kind of ETA on the next actual release? I am wanting possibly use Oxite for something, but cannot push it through with just using the HEAD revision from SVN since some of my superiors would like to see a few of the features baked into a release.
We unfortunately don't have an ETA, but I just put up a post about our progress.  Check it out: http://erikporter.com/Blog/Planning-for-the-Next-Oxite-Release
